name: Alien Death Mob (itch)
description:
Alien Death Mob!

OMG guys, aliens have invaded Earth!  Towns, cities, deserts, popular tourist attractions, they're everywhere!  Take on the role of Earth's last super soldier or whatever and eliminate the alien menace!  

An intense twin stick shooter, blast your way around the world taking on hordes of enemies.  Use bullet time to get out of sticky situations.  Collect the power ups, but don't forget to keep an eye on your multiplier to get those massive scores!

  • 30 missions set at various real world locations
  • Bullet time to help out in those desperate situations
  • Intense twin stick action
  • Loads of Power ups
  • Hordes of aliens to blast your way through
